comment.author: 77111989@N07
comment._content:
Is this the authenticated photo of Clara Harris Rathbone?  I only ask because over a decade ago a historian discovered that the National Archives photograph thought to be of Clara Harris was of someone else. The Mathew Brady portrait of her was taken in 1865, a few weeks after the assasination. She was not married then, although this photo shows a wedding ring. 
I can't imagine that the Archives would keep the incorrect photo up, but thought I'd ask.
